document_data.caption: A smaller hatchet seen next to an axe.
document_data.name: Hatchet
document_data.mainbody: '''Hatchets''' were tools sometimes used by [[ranger]]s or woodsmen throughout [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: A hatchet resembled a small [[axe]] with a blade on one side of the metal head and a flattened stub on the other. A typical hatchet weighed {{SI|3|lb|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.History:
Hatchets were versatile tools used for chopping and hammering wood. They could also be used as weapons.

Hatchets were available for purchase through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] for 2 [[gold piece]]s and included a leather case.
